storyInfo:
Back in Rhodes Island, Amiya does an excellent job of mobilizing the teams.
Throughout a conversation, the Doctor's relationship with Kal'tsit seems to improve.

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Bridge 6:00 A.M.
Attention, our outstanding operators, I have some important information to report to everyone in Rhodes Island. This is Amiya.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As of last night, Rhodes Island has officially left Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In light of recent developments, the trade agreement between us and Lungmen has been cancelled. We no longer have any reason or standing to remain inside the city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Fortunately, we've already purchased a lot of supplies from Lungmen, which will sustain our operations for a while.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Unfortunately... Some of our operators will shortly be going deep into Chernobog's core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: An extremely tough battle awaits us there.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Many may think that war is a distant concern to us.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: War, they may say, is a conflict between two countries, and has nothing to do with a pharmaceutical company.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But war... I think war has never left us.Â
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We have always been in a war. The long war of injustice against the Infected, the war that drives people to hate one another.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To develop an effective treatment for Oripathy and give the Infected a chance to use it, our medics have poured countless hours into their research.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Likewise, it has always been our goal to provide the most advanced medical treatment to those here who suffer from Oripathy, inhibiting and slowing the progression of Oripathy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But that is far from enough. Before we can achieve these goals, we must face the ever-growing conflicts between the Infected and uninfected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The enemies of the Infected will not see them treated. And each crime they commit against the Infected aggravates the tensions between the groups.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All while others exploit and enslave the Infected for their own profit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There are those who oppose us and even attack us, solely because we seek a cure for Oripathy... We have suffered this in the past.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Imagine... Imagine if we develop a medicine to treat this disease, but never have a chance to administer it to the Infected. What then?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our enemy is not only 'Oripathy.' There is no safety for us standing back from this war anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Two weeks ago, Reunion and Rhodes Island engaged in a violent confrontation. Many of our operators sacrificed themselves in Chernobog.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...a story we have seen unfold far too many times.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But if every sacrifice demands vengeance from us, then we will be locked into an endless cycle of revenge. Countless lives... will be taken.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Taken by our enemies, and taken by our own hands.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Our struggle with Reunion cannot rest upon hatred. If we are able to negotiate with them, we will demand from them an explanation, and hold them accountable for their actions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But Reunion is still gripped by their madness, even today. They have taken control of Chernobog's core city, and are driving it into Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even stranger, Ursus has not surrendered its territorial control of the core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They retain a territorial claim on Chernobog, even with it under Reunion's control, even when Ursus never...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even when Ursus never took action as this entire incident unfolded. The Empire of Ursus ignored the atrocities committed in Chernobog, and made no effort to stop them whatsoever.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...They abandoned their own citizens.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This has led me to conclude that Ursus has conspired to bring about these events. A collision with the core city will spark an international war. A war between Ursus and Yanââ
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By then, it will be too late.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter who stands behind Reunion, no matter how hard they've pushed, no matter who the real mastermind behind all this is: there will be only one truth laid grimly at our feet.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ââ'The Infected caused this war.'
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No matter the outcome of the war, the Infected will always be the scapegoat.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They will face even more brutal oppression, more miserable lives, and... an eternal, fiery hatred.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that comes to pass, all Rhodes Island has done will come to nothing. There won't be a single country in the world that will allow us to treat the Infected, or allow them a normal life.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Indeed... this is an unavoidable part of our protracted war on Oripathy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island has always been fighting this war. And it's a difficult war to win.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But despite that, we will never give up.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We will fight the fanatics with reason, and enmity with clever strategy. We will press on, because no one wants to see a bitter end to our efforts.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So we will stop Reunion. We will stop the Chernobog core city from colliding with Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I hope those of you staying here on the landship will look after Rhodes Island. Whether or not we return, Rhodes Island will fight on.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Right. Situation normal.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Great speech!;......;You make a charming orator.

attributes.content: Oh, um, thanks, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um? Doctor, is there something on my face? I didn't leave crumbs on it, did I?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Wait? What?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Yes, some other operators will think so too. They said, at times like these, we should be boosting morale.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I thought about it and realized we're not that kind of team. It's not about good or bad morale for us. We need to understand what it is we're doing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The harder things get, the more we need to tell everyone the truth. We can't be making our decisions blind.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: What could be more dangerous than walking around this world blindfolded...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I heard Madame Ch'en left Lungmen.

attributes.content: ...It's true. I'm thinking Madame Ch'en will probably steal into the core city alone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Lungmen, the Infected, her bloodline... Madame Ch'en is a complicated person, with a lot of contradictions tied up inside her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But even carrying around all that, she still didn't give up, she didn't run away. She carried it all with her into Chernobog.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's not afraid of betrayal, exile, or death.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, Madame Ch'en is Infected.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, when we get to the core city, we're also going to do what we can to rescue her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Not only because she... not only because Madame Ch'en is our friend, and not entirely because someone hired us to do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Madame Ch'en will not face Reunion alone. We will stand with her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everything she worked so hard to protect, and the painful silence she forced on herself... We will help her, because we both want the same thing.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Sounds pretty generous?;......;I thought you'd be more scared of that hard-ass.

attributes.content: Ah, haha. Doctor, that look on your mask... it's funny.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've doubted Madame Ch'en before. I took her for the type who couldn't change.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But when she reached out to help the Infected, I saw it. I saw the color of her heart.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I've never heard anything like that before.;......;That's an interesting turn of phrase.

attributes.content: Oh, err, it's just how I'd describe it!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't really know how to explain what I see... and it wouldn't be right to transmit it to people directly.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But to protect the Infected in a moving city, to keep to that ideal is... heroic.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Madame Ch'en isn't a cold-blooded person.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's stern and strict, but that's exactly why her sense of justice forces her to fight against the darkness in this world.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if she's never said so herself.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So, we'll go.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Sure. I made that promise myself!;Okay.;There's someone else who wanted me to stop Reunion.

attributes.content: ...Dr. {@nickname}, are you talking about...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...Miss FrostNova...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...right.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And... Misha.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If there's something we can do to prevent a repeat of Misha's tragedy, to bring some comfort to FrostNova and her men, and...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: To help even more people, to stop the birth of new sorrow in this land, we will do it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've sent both of you the information.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: This will be the first time the three of us have taken command together.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: You're going to work with me?;......;Am I supposed to be excited?

attributes.content: You could always stay here. It's up to you. I can't force you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Dr. Kal'tsit.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm listening.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope you can set aside whatever preconceptions you have of Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And I hope you'll set aside whatever prejudices you may have toward Dr. Kal'tsit, Dr. {@nickname}... from the things she's said before. At least for the time being.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} has amnesia. Rhodes Island has no reliable treatment to restore the Doctor's memory in just two short weeks.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: So everything that the Doctor is now is the product of new understanding and cognition.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, I hope you can look at this Dr. {@nickname} in a new light.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And Dr. {@nickname}, I don't want you doubting Dr. Kal'tsit's intentions just because of what she's said.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She's the person that...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...you can rely on the most. Whether you trust her or not, she is.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Please promise me, both of you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: What else can I do?;......;Looks like I have no choice.

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Water under the bridge isn't an option for us. Morality won't turn us into better people.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm not refusing your proposal, Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's just, forgiveness as a form of kindness, of waiving your right to anger, will only make us weak beyond measure.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I will not waive that right.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But for now, I'll shelve my prejudices. Let's deal with the core city first.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Once and for all.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.options: Amiya, I'm standing next to you.;......;Look forward to working with you, Kal'tsit.

attributes.content: Right... okay.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, it's not like I think that's a bad thing! I'm just... err, a little slow on the uptake.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I trust that you'll be there for me when it counts, Doctor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But what I wanted back before was for you to guide me, and take care of everything that I couldn't do in those difficult times...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I used to think that with the Doctor at my side, I could be brave.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, um... I'm okay, Dr. Kal'tsit. I've learned not to rely on other people anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But Doctor, just the Doctor... I really thought like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now, Doctor, we stand shoulder to shoulder. Ever since you came back to me, I've been waiting for the chance... to tell you... to tell you...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I've grown up. I don't need you, or Dr. Kal'tsit, or... um... I don't need you to protect me anymore.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'll get the results to prove that you were right to trust in me, Doctor. I promise.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hey! Shoulder to shoulder is just an expression. Don't call me short! I'm still growing...! Ugh! I'll be as tall as you in no time, Doctor!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: ...I'm just happy, Doctor. Yeah... just... very happy.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I am detecting a cold silence. Would you like me to raise the control room temperature a bit?
attributes.name: PRTS

attributes.content: I don't mind if the Doctor doesn't want to share.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I don't want to pry...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I get it. We... we all need our own space.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's just, Doctor, even if it's just a little...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, you don't have to take that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname} has certain skills, and lacks certain skills. And skills need time to recover. Dr. {@nickname} will make the right choice at the right time.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I hope that the Doctor has not forgotten everything that has happened since rejoining us.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: âIf I can be allowed that hope.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Dr. Kal'tsit, that's too much...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The Doctor just doesn't like to mince words. I'm know you go straight to the root of the problem, right?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If you're willing.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I didn't think it would be this easy. Honestly, I was even expecting you to weave in some traps and pitfalls among your words.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...But what's the harm?
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I look forward to working with you, Dr. {@nickname}.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Oh, yeah...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Um, which part of the plan are you asking about, Doctor?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: First, we'll need a way into the core city.;How do we get there?;We just walk up to Talulah and introduce ourselves, right?

attributes.content: Rhodes Island does have its own way of doing things.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Take a look at the report. I'll cover every part of the plan.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: In four hours, we'll trigger a small sandstorm in the path of the Chernobog core city.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: 10:00 A.M., Wilderness
Number one!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Compressor number one powered!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Number two!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Ammunition stockpile number two ready.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Number three.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Wind pump number three, camouflage... camouflage in place!
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Is the camouflage going to work...?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: The Chernobog core city command tower has a wide line of sight. This won't work without camouflage.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: They didn't even try to hide the fact that the core city was basically designed as a warship. The Empire thrives through violence and conquest.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Damn... So this is just how the Empire of Ursus designs things?
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: Designs put ideas into peoples' heads, and those ideas turn around and influence design. Living in an environment like this will breed a natural hostility towards outsiders, sooner or later.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: ...It's not fair to the ordinary Ursus civilians to paint them with such a broad brush.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Oh... um... I'll grab the backup cables.
attributes.name: Engineering Operator

attributes.content: But, how many crimes did Ursus commit against my hometown? They'll never be able to wash the blood off their hands.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Now, they seek to use the Infected to spark their next war, to justify even greater cruelty against the Infected. Does this not prove their brutality?
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: They put the torches to our fields and choked our wells with ashes. They razed entire villages, leaving only charred corpses behind... They slaughtered the land itself. Only rubble remains.Â
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Those are the 'ordinary Ursus civilians' I know. Had they not supported the war, none of these things would've happened.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: I believe that was not the collective will of the people of Ursus, but rather the manifestation of evil ideas. We are not fighting the people of Ursus, but against evil itself.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Firewatch, this may not be Kazimierz land we're standing on. But still, we will not see those atrocities repeated.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: It doesn't matter whether the enemy is Ursus or not. Reunion may call themselves Ursus, or they may not. But we're not here to hurt people. We're here to stop people from getting hurt.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: ...The knights never helped us guerillas.Â
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Our leaders waited years, but in the end, help never came. We fought to the last, alone, until we were devoured by Ursus. Not many of us are still around to tell the tale.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Who can I trust? How am I supposed to I believe in the benevolence of Ursus's 'honest folk?'
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: I don't blame the knights. Especially not you, Nearl. But I keep thinking back to the time I spent fighting Ursus.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: I don't trust them, and I don't trust Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: That was a grave mistake on the part of the Kazimierz knights. A mistake that they could not right. And, they did not manage to protect Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: But at least, we can fight side-by-side today, Firewatch.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: I didn't have a chance to help you back then, but this time, we fight. Not for our homes, but to put an end to Ursus's atrocities.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Even if we're only here as support, I'm still prepared. To fight for what I believe in, to die for you.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: To die for someone else...
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Not all knights are like you.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: But I believe this is what a knight should be. There is meaning in dying for someone else.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Madam Firewatch, let this battle be my apology to you.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: ...Operator Nearl.
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Anything you need me to do?
attributes.name: Firewatch

attributes.content: Guard the area, until the devices are fully operational.
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: 4 hours ago...

attributes.options: This is our disguise?;......;So we've already chosen our camouflage.Â

attributes.content: After so many major combat actions, infiltration is essentially a required course for our operators.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Every situation is different, but using the terrain to conceal your position is always a must.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sometimes it's snow, sometimes it's grassy plains, sometimes it's a swamp... we have different techniques every time.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Lungmen is here in the deserts and barrenlands, so use the sand to cover your tracks. That's the trick.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I'm not so sure about this.;That's not enough.;Maybe we shouldn't rely totally on this one tactic?

attributes.content: It's just a way to cover our tracks. Rhodes Island isn't about unilateral operations. Successful infiltration is the sum of a lot of moving parts.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The information the Azazel Clinic gave us authenticated the Chernobog blueprints I have. That means we have a solid picture of what the core city's lower levels look like.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: When the time comes, we'll enter through the drainage system in the foundation. But we'll need bait.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: We can't hook our prey without bait.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Heh... Yes. You're right.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But given enough time, even the worst hunter can tell the difference between prey and bait. We'll have to stay out of sight long enough to prevent that.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: You don't need us to land for this op, do you, Instructor?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: There isn't a good spot on the core city, and Reunion isn't exactly poorly equipped. They've got casters too. Landing would be trucky.
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: No need. Just make it look like we're going to land, but keep circling the city.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: We didn't bring a tactical team. Not much we can do with just the two of us.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Yeah, didn't think of that.
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: ...How would you not think of that...?!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: J-Just kidding, Instructor. Put the whip down.
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Hah... We got the wuss who flies the 'Bad Guy' and now this joker.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: You can keep us up for a half an hour, can't you?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Not a problem!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Just keep their attention! The Reunion element in the ruins knows we have aircraft, but we can't be sure about what their people in the core city might know.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Rest assured, you're riding the 'Good Boy,' and he's a lot noisier than the 'Bad Guy!' It'll be all eyes on us for a solid half hour. Just watch me, Instructor!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: Careful now. Don't get us shot down.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Just sit back and relax, Instructor. I chauffeured Blaze and Ascalon around a hundred times and we never got shot down on any of those low flights.
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: ...Getting shot down is a one time thing...
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: 10:00 a.m. Core City Outskirts
Huh?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: What's that...? Up in the sky?
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: They're flying?! The enemy brought a new weapon! What country is it from?! Just shoot it down already!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: We don't know what it's carrying. We can't let it land!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Don't panic! If it drops low enough, we'll light it up! Just don't let it out of your sight!
attributes.name: Reunion Caster

attributes.content: What kind of safety features are on this thing?
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Are you afraid of heights, Instructor?
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: A little.
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Don't worry!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: If something goes wrong, we won't have time to react. The crash will pulverize us. Won't even be able to identify our bodies. The great equalizer!
attributes.name: Pilot

attributes.content: How could I not worry?!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Amiya, we've managed to distract the enemy. They're convinced we're preparing to land. Begin the operation!
attributes.name: Dobermann

attributes.content: Attention, combat operators! A smattering of enemies is approaching our position. Likely a recon team from the core city!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Our equipment is active. We won't let them ruin our plans. Madam Firewatch, cover me!
attributes.name: Nearl

attributes.content: Roger!
attributes.name: Firewatch
